import React from 'react'; import './App.css' const Cardcss={ backgroundColor:'#F1E9DB', margin: '2% 0 2% 0', width: '250px', textAlign:'center', boxShadow: '2px 9px 18px -2px rgba(0,0,0,0.51)' } const btnCss={color:"white", fontSize:"18px", backgroundColor:'#e63946', fontWeight:"800", padding:'6px', borderRadius:'10px', outline:'none', cursor:'pointer', } function Cards(props){ return( <>

{props.title}

) } export default Cards;
